/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy life of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the image. The overall color palette is dominated by shades of green, gray, and blue, reflecting both the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
